mapper.select: SELECT tbl_user_coupon.id as userCouponId, tbl_user_coupon.coupon_id as couponId, tbl_user_coupon.user_id as userId, tbl_user_coupon.coupon_status as status, tbl_coupon.price, tbl_coupon.validity_start as validityStart, tbl_coupon.validity_end as validityEnd, description from tbl_user_coupon left join tbl_coupon on tbl_user_coupon.coupon_id = tbl_coupon.id where tbl_user_coupon.del_flag = 0 and tbl_user_coupon.user_id = #{accaUserId}
